UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Engineering disulfide bonds of the novel human beta-defensins hBD-27 and hBD-28: differences in disulfide formation and biological activity among human beta-defensins.
Literature.Author: Schulz A, Klüver E, Schulz-Maronde S, Adermann K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:7% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1128(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=25µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae DSM 11865(MIC=37.5µg/ml)
